text: Bolaji Amusan is a Nigerian comedian, popularly known as Mr Latin. He was born on October 15, 1966. he is a film maker, producer and a director. since 2018, he has been the president of Theatre Arts and Movie Practitioners Association of Nigeria.http://www.vanguardngr.com/2011/05/my-dream-was-to-become-a- footballer-mr-latin/ ==References== Category:1966 births Category:Living people Category:Comedians Category:Movie actors Category:Movie directors Category:Movie producers Category:People from Osun State
title: Bolaji Amusan
